ingredients: 1 package (4 ounces) dried corn husks (for wrapping tamales)
1 pound (8 to 10) fresh tomatillos, husks removed, halved
2 to 3 serrano OR jalapeno peppers, seeded
2 cups shredded OR diced, cooked chicken
1-1/2 teaspoons Mazola® Chicken Flavor Bouillon Powder (jar)
1/2 cup crumbled queso fresco, panela OR other Mexican melting cheese
